title: Music Festival Outfits: Denim Cut-Off Shorts | Lord & Taylor
description:
We’re headed into music festival season 2015 so put your best festival fashion foot forward.  We’re collecting festival clothing starting with denim cut-off shorts.  We love these jean shorts, whether they’re high waisted, white, black, or frayed.  Explore Lord & Taylor’s Design Lab for denim shorts and more festival outfit ideas.  

Shop Now: http://bit.ly/music-festival-outfits
